reviewText: I had the honor of studying under Jim Pallas in the late eighties, and I can say without hyperboyle that there was no other single force as important in my development as a professional artist as those precious years at MCC. I know he would hate to hear that, but I don't care. He's forever part of my "internal review board". This film is a rare glimpse into his unique world of irreverent vision, cartoonish irony and an uncompromising attitude. I make all my students and interns watch it as part of orientation. They are never disapointed.
